TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Nakanu, title = Nakanu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nakanu} }

S.FORM: Nakanu(u sulit nu Hulam: 拿卡努部落) u siwkay nu niyazu' i Taitung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Nakanu. u kasalumaluma' nu Nakanu sa, 80 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 273 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 244 ku tademaw, pakalatu 89%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 29 ku tademaw, pakalatu 11%. Isbubukun . : u asip nu tademaw u kasabinacadan, Yuwatan(Bunun) 80%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Paywan(Paiwan)1%, Puyuma1%, zumazuma 5%. u niyazu' nu Yuwatan(Bunun) u Yuwatan(Bunun) a niyazu' kuyni. katuud ku Yuwatan(Bunun) a tademaw itiniay a niyazu', inayay ku Sakizaya itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u Yincumin a kamu nu Sakizaya sananay, u ngiha' nu Hulam a kamu nu "原住民". u sakaizaay saan, u saayaway mueneng itiniay a tademaw sananay, itini uyiniyan a subal, tina subal a ngangan sa ku "Taywan", u Hulam a sulit sa ku 台灣. u sasubana'ay a kamu sa, Taywan Yincumin sa mikitinay "Timul Subal kamu cidekay " saan. u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiayay a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). situlu ku kakuniza nu Yincumincu, sakacacay ku ibukelalay, sakatusa ku ibuyuay, sakatulu sa ku tangabulanay . tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), 11Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052) tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan

Nakano(o solit no Holam: 拿卡努部落) o siwkay no niyazo' i Taitong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Nakano. o kasalomaloma' no Nakano sa, 80 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 273 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 244 ko tademaw, pakalato 89%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 29 ko tademaw, pakalato 11%. Isbobokon . : o asip no tademaw o kasabinacadan, Yowatan(Bonon) 80%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Paywan(Paiwan)1%, Poyoma1%, zomazoma 5%. o niyazo' no Yowatan(Bonon) o Yowatan(Bonon) a niyazo' koyni. katood ko Yowatan(Bonon) a tademaw itiniay a niyazo', inayay ko Sakizaya itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o Yincomin a kamo no Sakizaya sananay, o ngiha' no Holam a kamo no "原住民". o sakaizaay saan, o saayaway moeneng itiniay a tademaw sananay, itini oyiniyan a sobal, tina sobal a ngangan sa ko "Taywan", o Holam a solit sa ko 台灣. o sasobana'ay a kamo sa, Taywan Yincomin sa mikitinay "Timol Sobal kamo cidekay " saan. o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiayay a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). sitolo ko kakoniza no Yincominco, sakacacay ko ibokelalay, sakatosa ko iboyoay, sakatolo sa ko tangabolanay . tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), 11Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052) to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan
